RAGï¼ˆRetrieval-Augmented Generationï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ° OpenAI å¼•é¢†çš„ Function Callï¼Œå†åˆ°ç°åœ¨ Anthropic æŠ›å‡ºçš„ MCPï¼ˆModel Context Protocolï¼‰ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆéƒ½åœ¨è¯•å›¾è§£ç­”ä¸€ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼š&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;æ¨¡å‹å¦‚ä½•ä»¥æ›´è‡ªç„¶çš„æ–¹å¼è·å¾—å¤–éƒ¨ä¸–ç•Œçš„å¸®åŠ©ï¼Ÿ&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gpx852rexw14tckrj&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;MCP ä¸»æ‰“çš„æ˜¯ç»Ÿä¸€æ ‡å‡†å’Œè·¨æ¨¡å‹å…¼å®¹æ€§ã€‚è™½ç„¶åè®®æœ¬èº«å°šå¤„äºæ—©æœŸé˜¶æ®µï¼Œè®¾è®¡ä¹Ÿè¿œç§°ä¸ä¸Šå®Œç¾ï¼Œä½†å‡ºç°çš„æ—¶æœºååˆ†å·§å¦™ã€‚ã€‚å°±åƒå½“å¹´ OpenAI çš„ APIï¼Œä¸€æ—¦å½¢æˆäº‹å®æ ‡å‡†ï¼Œåé¢å“ªæ€•æœ‰ç‚¹æ¯›ç—…ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å¾ˆå¿«æ”¹è¿›ï¼Œæ¯•ç«Ÿç”Ÿæ€å…·æœ‰æ»šé›ªçƒæ•ˆåº”ï¼Œä¸€æ—¦ç”¨æˆ·åŸºæ•°å½¢æˆè§„æ¨¡ï¼Œè‡ªç„¶è€Œç„¶å°±æˆä¸ºäº‹å®æ ‡å‡†ã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gpx852haddip6krj&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;æœ¬ç¯‡æ–‡ç« å°†ç»“åˆ codeä¸¤ä¸ªå·¥å…·ï¼ˆå‡½æ•°ï¼‰è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;cc5ixe&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj1n9apymxoks52in&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;#mcp_server_demo.py\nfrom mcp.server.fastmcp import FastMCP\nimport asyncio\n\nmcp = FastMCP(name=\&quot;weather-demo\&quot;, host=\&quot;0.0.0.0\&quot;, port=1234)\n\n@mcp.tool(name=\&quot;get_weather\&quot;, description=\&quot;è·å–æŒ‡å®šåŸå¸‚çš„å¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯\&quot;)\nasync def get_weather(city: str) -> str:\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    è·å–æŒ‡å®šåŸå¸‚çš„å¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    weather_data = {\n        \&quot;åŒ—äº¬\&quot;: \&quot;åŒ—äº¬ï¼šæ™´ï¼Œ25Â°C\&quot;,\n        \&quot;ä¸Šæµ·\&quot;: \&quot;ä¸Šæµ·ï¼šå¤šäº‘ï¼Œ27Â°C\&quot;\n    }\n    return weather_data.get(city, f\&quot;{city}ï¼šå¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯æœªçŸ¥\&quot;)\n\n@mcp.tool(name=\&quot;suggest_activity\&quot;, description=\&quot;æ ¹æ®å¤©æ°”æè¿°æ¨èé€‚åˆçš„æ´»åŠ¨\&quot;)\nasync def suggest_activity(condition: str) -> str:\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    æ ¹æ®å¤©æ°”æè¿°æ¨èé€‚åˆçš„æ´»åŠ¨\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    if \&quot;æ™´\&quot; in condition:\n        return \&quot;å¤©æ°”æ™´æœ—ï¼Œæ¨èä½ å»æˆ·å¤–æ•£æ­¥æˆ–è¿åŠ¨ã€‚\&quot;\n    elif \&quot;å¤šäº‘\&quot; in condition:\n        return \&quot;å¤šäº‘å¤©æ°”é€‚åˆé€›å…¬å›­æˆ–å’–å•¡é¦†ã€‚\&quot;\n    elif \&quot;é›¨\&quot; in condition:\n        return \&quot;ä¸‹é›¨äº†ï¼Œå»ºè®®ä½ åœ¨å®¶é˜…è¯»æˆ–çœ‹ç”µå½±ã€‚\&quot;\n    else:\n        return \&quot;å»ºè®®è¿›è¡Œå®¤å†…æ´»åŠ¨ã€‚\&quot;\n\nasync def main():\n    print(\&quot;âœ… å¯åŠ¨ MCP Server: http://127.0.0.1:1234\&quot;)\n    await mcp.run_sse_async()\n\nif __name__ == \&quot;__main__\&quot;:\n    asyncio.run(main())\n&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;#mcp_server_demo.py\nfrom mcp.server.fastmcp description=\&quot;è·å–æŒ‡å®šåŸå¸‚çš„å¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯\&quot;)\nasync def get_weather(city: str) -> str:\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    è·å–æŒ‡å®šåŸå¸‚çš„å¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n f\&quot;{city}ï¼šå¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯æœªçŸ¥\&quot;)\n\n@mcp.tool(name=\&quot;suggest_activity\&quot;, description=\&quot;æ ¹æ®å¤©æ°”æè¿°æ¨èé€‚åˆçš„æ´»åŠ¨\&quot;)\nasync def suggest_activity(condition: str) -> str:\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    æ ¹æ®å¤©æ°”æè¿°æ¨èé€‚åˆçš„æ´»åŠ¨\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    if \&quot;æ™´\&quot; in condition:\n        return \&quot;é›¨\&quot; in condition:\n        return \&quot;ä¸‹é›¨äº†ï¼Œå»ºè®®ä½ åœ¨å®¶é˜…è¯»æˆ–çœ‹ç”µå½±ã€‚\&quot;\n    else:\n        return \&quot;å»ºè®®è¿›è¡Œå®¤å†…æ´»åŠ¨ã€‚\&quot;\n\nasync def main():\n    print(\&quot;âœ… å¯åŠ¨ MCP Server: http://127.0.0.1:1234\&quot;)\n    await mcp.run_sse_async()\n\nif __name__ == \&quot;__main__\&quot;:\n    asyncio.run(main())\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj19coj4uvzw1w3l&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]],[&quot;img&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;68qgtg&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;image.png&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:571939,&quot;width&quot;:748,&quot;height&quot;:300.31226765799255,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https://oss-ata.alibaba.com/article/2025/04/9aa5d1a3-c839-4dea-82a7-61cf0d93fe7d.png&quot;,&quot;extraData&quot;:{&quot;resourceId&quot;:&quot;0e1d9393-4b47-47c6-9ddc-b7f6dfcb268e&quot;,&quot;metaData&quot;:{&quot;size&quot;:571939,&quot;originWidth&quot;:2152,&quot;originHeight&quot;:864,&quot;format&quot;:&quot;png&quot;,&quot;ratio&quot;:1}}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj382igfqj0jh950p&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj386lf6f8dxfpcid&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;å¤§æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨ä»£ç &quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gnqk3osdq10y2u83r&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;å¤§æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨openrouterè¿™ä¸ªLLMçš„èšåˆç½‘ç«™ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯å› ä¸ºè¯¥ç½‘ç«™æ–¹ä¾¿è°ƒç”¨ä¸æµ‹è¯•ä¸åŒçš„æ¨¡å‹ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ç½‘ç»œç¯å¢ƒå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è¿æ¥è€Œä¸ç”¨å…¶ä»–æ‰‹æ®µã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gns3uy38jmq8jngk6&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;3snrpo&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj3harjfft3rgbm3g&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;# llm_router.py\nimport json\nimport requests\n\n# OpenRouter é…ç½®\nOPENROUTER_API_KEY = 'è¿™é‡Œå†™å…¥ä½¿ç”¨çš„Key'\nOPENROUTER_API_URL = \&quot;https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/chat/completions\&quot;\n\nOPENROUTER_HEADERS = {\n    \&quot;Authorization\&quot;: f\&quot;Bearer {OPENROUTER_API_KEY}\&quot;,\n    \&quot;Content-Type\&quot;: \&quot;application/json\&quot;,\n    \&quot;HTTP-Referer\&quot;: \&quot;http://localhost\&quot;,\n    \&quot;X-Title\&quot;: \&quot;MCP Demo Server\&quot;\n}\n\n\nclass OpenRouterLLM:\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    è‡ªå®šä¹‰ LLM ç±»ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ OpenRouter API æ¥ç”Ÿæˆå›å¤\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    def __init__(self, model: str = LLM_MODEL):\n        self.model = model\n\n    def generate(self, messages):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        å‘é€å¯¹è¯æ¶ˆæ¯ç»™ OpenRouter API å¹¶è¿”å› LLM çš„å›å¤æ–‡æœ¬\n\n        å‚æ•°:\n            messages: ä¸€ä¸ª listï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯å½¢å¦‚ {'role': role, 'content': content} çš„å­—å…¸\n\n        è¿”å›:\n            LLM è¿”å›çš„å›å¤æ–‡æœ¬\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        request_body = {\n            \&quot;model\&quot;: self.model,\n            \&quot;messages\&quot;: messages\n        }\n\n        print(f\&quot;å‘é€è¯·æ±‚åˆ° OpenRouter: {json.dumps(request_body, ensure_ascii=False)}\&quot;)\n\n        response = requests.post(\n            OPENROUTER_API_URL,\n            headers=OPENROUTER_HEADERS,\n            json=request_body\n        )\n\n        if response.status_code != 200:\n            print(f\&quot;OpenRouter API é”™è¯¯: {response.status_code}\&quot;)\n            print(f\&quot;é”™è¯¯è¯¦æƒ…: {response.text}\&quot;)\n            raise Exception(f\&quot;OpenRouter API è¿”å›é”™è¯¯: {response.status_code}\&quot;)\n\n        response_json = response.json()\n        print(f\&quot;OpenRouter API å“åº”: {json.dumps(response_json, ensure_ascii=False)}\&quot;)\n\n        # æå– LLM å“åº”æ–‡æœ¬\n        try:\n            content = response_json['choices'][0]['message']['content']\n            return content\n        except KeyError:\n            raise Exception(\&quot;æ— æ³•ä» OpenRouter å“åº”ä¸­æå–å†…å®¹\&quot;)\n\n\n# å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ç‹¬ç«‹æµ‹è¯•è¯¥æ¨¡å—ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤è¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„æµ‹è¯•\nif __name__ == \&quot;__main__\&quot;:\n    # ç¤ºä¾‹ç³»ç»Ÿæç¤ºå’Œç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥\n    messages = [\n        {\&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;system\&quot;, \&quot;content\&quot;: \&quot;ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™ºèƒ½åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¸®åŠ©æŸ¥è¯¢å¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚\&quot;},\n        {\&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;user\&quot;, \&quot;content\&quot;: \&quot;è¯·å‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘åŒ—äº¬ä»Šå¤©çš„å¤©æ°”æƒ…å†µã€‚\&quot;}\n    ]\n\n    llm = OpenRouterLLM()\n    try:\n        result = llm.generate(messages)\n        print(\&quot;LLM è¿”å›ç»“æœ:\&quot;)\n        print(result)\n    except Exception as e:\n        print(f\&quot;è°ƒç”¨ OpenRouter æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿå¼‚å¸¸: {e}\&quot;)\n&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;# llm_router.py\nimport json\nimport requests\n\n# OpenRouter é…ç½®\nOPENROUTER_API_KEY = 'è¿™é‡Œå†™å…¥ä½¿ç”¨çš„Key'\nOPENROUTER_API_URL = \&quot;https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/chat/completions\&quot;\n\nOPENROUTER_HEADERS = {\n    \&quot;Authorization\&quot;: f\&quot;Bearer {OPENROUTER_API_KEY}\&quot;,\n    \&quot;Content-Type\&quot;: \&quot;application/json\&quot;,\n    \&quot;HTTP-Referer\&quot;: \&quot;http://localhost\&quot;,\n    \&quot;X-Title\&quot;: \&quot;MCP Demo Server\&quot;\n}\n\n\nclass OpenRouterLLM:\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    è‡ªå®šä¹‰ LLM ç±»ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ OpenRouter API æ¥ç”Ÿæˆå›å¤\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    def __init__(self, model: str = LLM_MODEL):\n        self.model = model\n\n    def generate(self, messages):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        å‘é€å¯¹è¯æ¶ˆæ¯ç»™ OpenRouter API å¹¶è¿”å› LLM çš„å›å¤æ–‡æœ¬\n\n        å‚æ•°:\n            messages: ä¸€ä¸ª listï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯å½¢å¦‚ {'role': role, 'content': content} çš„å­—å…¸\n\n        è¿”å›:\n            LLM è¿”å›çš„å›å¤æ–‡æœ¬\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        request_body = {\n            \&quot;model\&quot;: self.model,\n            \&quot;messages\&quot;: messages\n        }\n\n        print(f\&quot;å‘é€è¯·æ±‚åˆ° OpenRouter: {json.dumps(request_body, ensure_ascii=False)}\&quot;)\n\n        response = requests.post(\n            OPENROUTER_API_URL,\n            headers=OPENROUTER_HEADERS,\n            json=request_body\n        )\n\n        if response.status_code != 200:\n            print(f\&quot;OpenRouter API é”™è¯¯: {response.status_code}\&quot;)\n            print(f\&quot;é”™è¯¯è¯¦æƒ…: {response.text}\&quot;)\n            raise Exception(f\&quot;OpenRouter API è¿”å›é”™è¯¯: {response.status_code}\&quot;)\n\n        response_json = response.json()\n        print(f\&quot;OpenRouter API å“åº”: {json.dumps(response_json, ensure_ascii=False)}\&quot;)\n\n        # æå– LLM å“åº”æ–‡æœ¬\n        try:\n            content = response_json['choices'][0]['message']['content']\n            return content\n        except KeyError:\n            raise Exception(\&quot;æ— æ³•ä» OpenRouter å“åº”ä¸­æå–å†…å®¹\&quot;)\n\n\n# å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ç‹¬ç«‹æµ‹è¯•è¯¥æ¨¡å—ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤è¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„æµ‹è¯•\nif __name__ == \&quot;__main__\&quot;:\n    # ç¤ºä¾‹ç³»ç»Ÿæç¤ºå’Œç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥\n    messages = [\n        {\&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;system\&quot;, \&quot;content\&quot;: \&quot;ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™ºèƒ½åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¸®åŠ©æŸ¥è¯¢å¤©æ°”ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚\&quot;},\n        {\&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;user\&quot;, \&quot;content\&quot;: \&quot;è¯·å‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘åŒ—äº¬ä»Šå¤©çš„å¤©æ°”æƒ…å†µã€‚\&quot;}\n    ]\n\n    llm = OpenRouterLLM()\n    try:\n        result = llm.generate(messages)\n        print(\&quot;LLM è¿”å›ç»“æœ:\&quot;)\n        print(result)\n    except Exception as e:\n        print(f\&quot;è°ƒç”¨ OpenRouter æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿå¼‚å¸¸: {e}\&quot;)\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj3eqam83b3a4mmqg&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj63omo60niumykm&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;MCP Client&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gnds2kda39p1azkr9&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;è¿™é‡Œçš„MCP Clientï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Server-Side Eventï¼ˆSSEï¼‰æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œè¿æ¥ï¼ˆé¢˜å¤–è¯ï¼ŒMCPåè®®ä½¿ç”¨SSEåè®®ä½œä¸ºé»˜è®¤è¿œç¨‹åè®®ç¨å¾®æœ‰ç‚¹å¥‡æ€ªï¼Œå¬è¯´åç»­è¿­ä»£ä¼šè€ƒè™‘HTTP Streamingä»¥åŠJSONRPC over HTTP2çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼‰ã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gnp8yw4kyzv1cwung&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;è¿™é‡Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨mainæµ‹è¯•ä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œå°è¯•åˆ—å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„Toolä¸Resourceï¼Œå¹¶å°è¯•è°ƒç”¨Toolï¼Œç»“æœå¦‚å›¾ï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°èƒ½å¤Ÿå±•ç¤ºå‡ºMCP Serverä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„Toolã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;akhang&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj6it14ni61mp9b96&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;# mcp_client_demo.py\nimport asyncio\nfrom mcp.client.session import ClientSession\nfrom mcp.client.sse import sse_client\n\nclass WeatherMCPClient:\n    def __init__(self, server_url=\&quot;http://127.0.0.1:1234/sse\&quot;):\n        self.server_url = server_url\n        self._sse_context = None\n        self._session = None\n\n    async def __aenter__(self):\n        # åˆ›å»º SSE é€šé“\n        self._sse_context = sse_client(self.server_url)\n        self.read, self.write = await self._sse_context.__aenter__()\n\n        # åˆ›å»º MCP ä¼šè¯\n        self._session = ClientSession(self.read, self.write)\n        await self._session.__aenter__()\n        await self._session.initialize()\n\n        return self\n\n    async def __aexit__(self, exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb):\n        if self._session:\n            await self._session.__aexit__(exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb)\n        if self._sse_context:\n            await self._sse_context.__aexit__(exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb)\n\n    async def list_tools(self):\n        return await self._session.list_tools()\n\n    async def list_resources(self):\n        return await self._session.list_resources()\n\n    async def call_tool(self, name, arguments):\n        return await self._session.call_tool(name, arguments)\n\n\nasync def main():\n    async with WeatherMCPClient() as client:\n        print(\&quot;âœ… æˆåŠŸè¿æ¥ MCP Server\&quot;)\n\n        tools = await client.list_tools()\n\n        print(\&quot;\\nğŸ›  å¯ç”¨å·¥å…·:\&quot;)\n        print(tools)\n\n        resources = await client.list_resources()\n        print(\&quot;\\nğŸ“š å¯ç”¨èµ„æº:\&quot;)\n        print(resources)\n\n        print(\&quot;\\nğŸ“¡ è°ƒç”¨ WeatherTool å·¥å…·(city=åŒ—äº¬)...\&quot;)\n        result = await client.call_tool(\&quot;get_weather\&quot;, {\&quot;city\&quot;: \&quot;åŒ—äº¬\&quot;})\n\n        print(\&quot;\\nğŸ¯ å·¥å…·è¿”å›:\&quot;)\n        for item in result.content:\n            print(\&quot; -\&quot;, item.text)\n\nif __name__ == \&quot;__main__\&quot;:\n    asyncio.run(main())\n\n&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;# mcp_client_demo.py\nimport asyncio\nfrom mcp.client.session import ClientSession\nfrom mcp.client.sse import sse_client\n\nclass WeatherMCPClient:\n    def __init__(self, server_url=\&quot;http://127.0.0.1:1234/sse\&quot;):\n        self.server_url = server_url\n        self._sse_context = None\n        self._session = None\n\n    async def __aenter__(self):\n        # åˆ›å»º SSE é€šé“\n        self._sse_context = sse_client(self.server_url)\n        self.read, self.write = await self._sse_context.__aenter__()\n\n        # åˆ›å»º MCP ä¼šè¯\n        self._session = ClientSession(self.read, self.write)\n        await self._session.__aenter__()\n        await self._session.initialize()\n\n        return self\n\n    async def __aexit__(self, exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb):\n        if self._session:\n            await self._session.__aexit__(exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb)\n        if self._sse_context:\n            await self._sse_context.__aexit__(exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb)\n\n    async def list_tools(self):\n        return await self._session.list_tools()\n\n    async def list_resources(self):\n        return await self._session.list_resources()\n\n    async def call_tool(self, name, arguments):\n        return await self._session.call_tool(name, arguments)\n\n\nasync def main():\n    async with WeatherMCPClient() as client:\n        print(\&quot;âœ… æˆåŠŸè¿æ¥ MCP Server\&quot;)\n\n        tools = await client.list_tools()\n\n        print(\&quot;\\nğŸ›  å¯ç”¨å·¥å…·:\&quot;)\n        print(tools)\n\n        resources = await client.list_resources()\n        print(\&quot;\\nğŸ“š å¯ç”¨èµ„æº:\&quot;)\n        print(resources)\n\n        print(\&quot;\\nğŸ“¡ è°ƒç”¨ WeatherTool å·¥å…·(city=åŒ—äº¬)...\&quot;)\n        result = await client.call_tool(\&quot;get_weather\&quot;, {\&quot;city\&quot;: \&quot;åŒ—äº¬\&quot;})\n\n        print(\&quot;\\nğŸ¯ å·¥å…·è¿”å›:\&quot;)\n        for item in result.content:\n            print(\&quot; -\&quot;, item.text)\n\nif __name__ == \&quot;__main__\&quot;:\n    asyncio.run(main())\n\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj6fxwqdgj50z818&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]],[&quot;img&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;eqwgbs&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;image.png&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:286825,&quot;width&quot;:748,&quot;height&quot;:187.3021001615509,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https://oss-ata.alibaba.com/article/2025/04/cd1f471a-5114-4554-9da7-ed0e40c0a41c.png&quot;,&quot;extraData&quot;:{&quot;resourceId&quot;:&quot;d546eec0-1b7d-408b-bb65-10ec60166a59&quot;,&quot;metaData&quot;:{&quot;size&quot;:286825,&quot;originWidth&quot;:2476,&quot;originHeight&quot;:620,&quot;format&quot;:&quot;png&quot;,&quot;ratio&quot;:1}}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj78d59puwlerxv5m&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9go015no5b71vxt5f&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;MCP Host&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9go0oplwn7pu5dyab&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;MCP hostçš„è§’è‰²ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦åµŒå…¥AIçš„åº”ç”¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç¨‹åºï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªCRMç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªOAï¼ŒMCP HoståŒ…å«MCP Clientï¼Œç”¨äºé›†æˆLLMä¸Toolï¼ŒMCP Hostä¹‹å¤–+Tool+å¤§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œå…±åŒæ„æˆäº†ä¸€å¥—åŸºäºAIçš„ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œç°åœ¨æµè¡Œçš„è¯´æ³•æ˜¯AI Agentï¼ˆä¸­æ–‡ç¿»è¯‘ï¼šAIæ™ºèƒ½ä½“ï¼Ÿï¼‰&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9go62hqpkzqntnhldi&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;MCP Hostä»£ç ä¸­æ­¥éª¤æ³¨é‡Šï¼Œä¸å›¾1ä¸­çš„æ•´ä½“MCPæµç¨‹å¯¹é½ã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;l6x1gu&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9go04w8djbo41vw7d4&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;import asyncio\nimport json\nimport re\nfrom llm_router import OpenRouterLLM\nfrom mcp_client_demo import WeatherMCPClient\n\n\ndef extract_json_from_reply(reply: str):\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    æå– LLM è¿”å›çš„ JSON å†…å®¹ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç† markdown åŒ…è£¹ã€å¤šä½™å¼•å·ã€åµŒå¥—ç­‰ã€‚\n    æ”¯æŒ string æˆ– dict æ ¼å¼ã€‚\n    å¦‚æœæ— æ³•è§£å‡º dictï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›åŸå§‹ stringã€‚\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    # å¦‚æœå·²ç»æ˜¯ dictï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›\n    if isinstance(reply, dict):\n        return reply\n\n    # æ¸…é™¤ markdown ```json ``` åŒ…è£¹\n    if isinstance(reply, str):\n        reply = re.sub(r\&quot;^```(?:json)?|```$\&quot;, \&quot;\&quot;, reply.strip(), flags=re.IGNORECASE).strip()\n\n    # æœ€å¤šå°è¯• 3 å±‚ json.loads è§£ç \n    for _ in range(3):\n        try:\n            parsed = json.loads(reply)\n            if isinstance(parsed, dict):\n                return parsed\n            else:\n                reply = parsed  # å¦‚æœè§£å‡ºæ¥è¿˜æ˜¯ strï¼Œç»§ç»­ä¸‹ä¸€å±‚\n        except Exception:\n            break\n\n    # å¦‚æœæœ€ç»ˆä¸æ˜¯ dictï¼Œè¿”å›åŸå§‹å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ˆè¡¨ç¤ºæ˜¯æ™®é€šç­”å¤ï¼‰\n    return reply\n\n\nllm = OpenRouterLLM()\n\n\nasync def main():\n    # === åˆå§‹åŒ– MCP å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ ===\n    client = WeatherMCPClient()\n    await client.__aenter__()\n\n    tools = await client.list_tools()\n    resources = await client.list_resources()\n    tool_names = [t.name for t in tools.tools]\n\n    tool_descriptions = \&quot;\\n\&quot;.join(f\&quot;- {t.name}: {t.description}\&quot; for t in tools.tools)\n    resource_descriptions = \&quot;\\n\&quot;.join(f\&quot;- {r.uri}\&quot; for r in resources.resources)\n\n    while True:\n        # === Step 1. ç”¨æˆ· â†’ MCPä¸»æœºï¼šæå‡ºé—®é¢˜ ===\n        user_input = input(\&quot;\\nè¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼ˆè¾“å…¥ exit é€€å‡ºï¼‰ï¼š\\n> \&quot;)\n        if user_input.lower() in (\&quot;exit\&quot;, \&quot;é€€å‡º\&quot;):\n            break\n\n        # æ„é€ ç³»ç»Ÿæç¤º + å·¥å…·è¯´æ˜\n        system_prompt = (\n            \&quot;ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™ºèƒ½åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œæ‹¥æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å·¥å…·å’Œèµ„æºå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨ï¼š\\n\\n\&quot;\n            f\&quot;ğŸ›  å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨ï¼š\\n{tool_descriptions or 'ï¼ˆæ— ï¼‰'}\\n\\n\&quot;\n            f\&quot;ğŸ“š èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨ï¼š\\n{resource_descriptions or 'ï¼ˆæ— ï¼‰'}\\n\\n\&quot;\n            \&quot;è¯·ä¼˜å…ˆè°ƒç”¨å¯ç”¨çš„Toolæˆ–Resourceï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯llmå†…éƒ¨ç”Ÿæˆã€‚ä»…æ ¹æ®ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œä¸ä¼ å…¥ä¸éœ€è¦çš„å‚æ•°è¿›è¡Œè°ƒç”¨\\n\&quot;\n            \&quot;å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ï¼Œè¯·ä»¥ JSON è¿”å› tool_callsï¼Œæ ¼å¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š\\n\&quot;\n            '{\&quot;tool_calls\&quot;: [{\&quot;name\&quot;: \&quot;get_weather\&quot;, \&quot;arguments\&quot;: {\&quot;city\&quot;: \&quot;åŒ—äº¬\&quot;}}]}\\n'\n            \&quot;å¦‚æ— éœ€è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œè¿”å›ï¼š{\\\&quot;tool_calls\\\&quot;: null}\&quot;\n        )\n\n        # === æ„é€  LLM ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ¶ˆæ¯ ===\n        messages = [\n            {\&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;system\&quot;, \&quot;content\&quot;: system_prompt},\n            {\&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;user\&quot;, \&quot;content\&quot;: user_input}\n        ]\n\n        final_reply = \&quot;\&quot;\n\n        # === å¾ªç¯å¤„ç† tool_callsï¼Œç›´åˆ° LLM ç»™å‡ºæœ€ç»ˆ content ä¸ºæ­¢ ===\n        while True:\n            # === Step 2. MCPä¸»æœº â†’ LLMï¼šè½¬å‘ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ ===\n            reply = llm.generate(messages)\n            print(f\&quot;\\nğŸ¤– LLM å›å¤ï¼š\\n{reply}\&quot;)\n\n            # === Step 3. è§£æ JSON æ ¼å¼å›å¤ï¼ˆæˆ–æ™®é€šå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼‰ ===\n            parsed = extract_json_from_reply(reply)\n\n            # === å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ™®é€šè‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œè¯´æ˜ LLM å·²ç›´æ¥ç­”å¤ç”¨æˆ· ===\n            if isinstance(parsed, str):\n                final_reply = parsed\n                break\n\n            # === å¦‚æœæ˜¯å­—å…¸ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ ===\n            tool_calls = parsed.get(\&quot;tool_calls\&quot;)\n            if not tool_calls:\n                # LLM ç»™å‡ºæ™®é€šç­”å¤ç»“æ„ï¼ˆå¸¦ content å­—æ®µï¼‰\n                final_reply = parsed.get(\&quot;content\&quot;, \&quot;\&quot;)\n                break\n\n            # === éå† LLM è¯·æ±‚çš„å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨åˆ—è¡¨ ===\n            for tool_call in tool_calls:\n                # === Step 4. LLM â†’ MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šè¯·æ±‚ä½¿ç”¨å·¥å…· ===\n                tool_name = tool_call[\&quot;name\&quot;]\n                arguments = tool_call[\&quot;arguments\&quot;]\n\n                if tool_name not in tool_names:\n                    raise ValueError(f\&quot;âŒ å·¥å…· {tool_name} æœªæ³¨å†Œ\&quot;)\n\n                # === Step 5. MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ â†’ MCPæœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼šè°ƒç”¨å·¥å…· ===\n                print(f\&quot;ğŸ›  è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…· {tool_name} å‚æ•°: {arguments}\&quot;)\n                result = await client.call_tool(tool_name, arguments)\n\n                # === Step 8. MCPæœåŠ¡å™¨ â†’ MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šè¿”å›ç»“æœ ===\n                tool_output = result.content[0].text\n                print(f\&quot;ğŸ“¦ å·¥å…· {tool_name} è¿”å›ï¼š{tool_output}\&quot;)\n\n                # === Step 9. MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ â†’ LLMï¼šæä¾›å·¥å…·ç»“æœ ===\n                messages.append({\n                    \&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;tool\&quot;,\n                    \&quot;name\&quot;: tool_name,\n                    \&quot;content\&quot;: tool_output\n                })\n\n            # Step 10: å†æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨ LLMï¼Œè¿›å…¥ä¸‹ä¸€è½®ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½å†æ¬¡äº§ç”Ÿ tool_callsï¼‰\n\n        # === Step 11. MCPä¸»æœº â†’ ç”¨æˆ·ï¼šæœ€ç»ˆç»“æœç­”å¤ ===\n        print(f\&quot;\\nğŸ¯ æœ€ç»ˆç­”å¤ï¼š{final_reply}\&quot;)\n\n    await client.__aexit__(None, None, None)\n\n\nif __name__ == \&quot;__main__\&quot;:\n    asyncio.run(main())\n&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;import asyncio\nimport json\nimport re\nfrom llm_router import OpenRouterLLM\nfrom mcp_client_demo import WeatherMCPClient\n\n\ndef extract_json_from_reply(reply: str):\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    æå– LLM è¿”å›çš„ JSON å†…å®¹ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç† markdown åŒ…è£¹ã€å¤šä½™å¼•å·ã€åµŒå¥—ç­‰ã€‚\n    æ”¯æŒ string æˆ– dict æ ¼å¼ã€‚\n    å¦‚æœæ— æ³•è§£å‡º dictï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›åŸå§‹ stringã€‚\n    \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n    # å¦‚æœå·²ç»æ˜¯ dictï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›\n    if isinstance(reply, dict):\n        return reply\n\n    # æ¸…é™¤ markdown ```json ``` åŒ…è£¹\n    if isinstance(reply, str):\n        reply = re.sub(r\&quot;^```(?:json)?|```$\&quot;, \&quot;\&quot;, reply.strip(), flags=re.IGNORECASE).strip()\n\n    # æœ€å¤šå°è¯• 3 å±‚ json.loads è§£ç \n    for _ in range(3):\n        try:\n            parsed = json.loads(reply)\n            if isinstance(parsed, dict):\n                return parsed\n            else:\n                reply = parsed  # å¦‚æœè§£å‡ºæ¥è¿˜æ˜¯ strï¼Œç»§ç»­ä¸‹ä¸€å±‚\n        except Exception:\n            break\n\n    # å¦‚æœæœ€ç»ˆä¸æ˜¯ dictï¼Œè¿”å›åŸå§‹å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ˆè¡¨ç¤ºæ˜¯æ™®é€šç­”å¤ï¼‰\n    return reply\n\n\nllm = OpenRouterLLM()\n\n\nasync def main():\n    # === åˆå§‹åŒ– MCP å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ ===\n    client = WeatherMCPClient()\n    await client.__aenter__()\n\n    tools = await client.list_tools()\n    resources = await client.list_resources()\n    tool_names = [t.name for t in tools.tools]\n\n    tool_descriptions = \&quot;\\n\&quot;.join(f\&quot;- {t.name}: {t.description}\&quot; for t in tools.tools)\n    resource_descriptions = \&quot;\\n\&quot;.join(f\&quot;- {r.uri}\&quot; for r in resources.resources)\n\n    while True:\n        # === Step 1. ç”¨æˆ· â†’ MCPä¸»æœºï¼šæå‡ºé—®é¢˜ ===\n        user_input = input(\&quot;\\nè¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼ˆè¾“å…¥ exit é€€å‡ºï¼‰ï¼š\\n> \&quot;)\n        if user_input.lower() in (\&quot;exit\&quot;, \&quot;é€€å‡º\&quot;):\n            break\n\n        # æ„é€ ç³»ç»Ÿæç¤º + å·¥å…·è¯´æ˜\n        system_prompt = (\n            \&quot;ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™ºèƒ½åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œæ‹¥æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å·¥å…·å’Œèµ„æºå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨ï¼š\\n\\n\&quot;\n            f\&quot;ğŸ›  å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨ï¼š\\n{tool_descriptions or 'ï¼ˆæ— ï¼‰'}\\n\\n\&quot;\n            f\&quot;ğŸ“š èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨ï¼š\\n{resource_descriptions or 'ï¼ˆæ— ï¼‰'}\\n\\n\&quot;\n            \&quot;è¯·ä¼˜å…ˆè°ƒç”¨å¯ç”¨çš„Toolæˆ–Resourceï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯llmå†…éƒ¨ç”Ÿæˆã€‚ä»…æ ¹æ®ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œä¸ä¼ å…¥ä¸éœ€è¦çš„å‚æ•°è¿›è¡Œè°ƒç”¨\\n\&quot;\n            \&quot;å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ï¼Œè¯·ä»¥ JSON è¿”å› tool_callsï¼Œæ ¼å¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š\\n\&quot;\n            '{\&quot;tool_calls\&quot;: [{\&quot;name\&quot;: \&quot;get_weather\&quot;, \&quot;arguments\&quot;: {\&quot;city\&quot;: \&quot;åŒ—äº¬\&quot;}}]}\\n'\n            \&quot;å¦‚æ— éœ€è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œè¿”å›ï¼š{\\\&quot;tool_calls\\\&quot;: null}\&quot;\n        )\n\n        # === æ„é€  LLM ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ¶ˆæ¯ ===\n        messages = [\n            {\&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;system\&quot;, \&quot;content\&quot;: system_prompt},\n            {\&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;user\&quot;, \&quot;content\&quot;: user_input}\n        ]\n\n        final_reply = \&quot;\&quot;\n\n        # === å¾ªç¯å¤„ç† tool_callsï¼Œç›´åˆ° LLM ç»™å‡ºæœ€ç»ˆ content ä¸ºæ­¢ ===\n        while True:\n            # === Step 2. MCPä¸»æœº â†’ LLMï¼šè½¬å‘ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ ===\n            reply = llm.generate(messages)\n            print(f\&quot;\\nğŸ¤– LLM å›å¤ï¼š\\n{reply}\&quot;)\n\n            # === Step 3. è§£æ JSON æ ¼å¼å›å¤ï¼ˆæˆ–æ™®é€šå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼‰ ===\n            parsed = extract_json_from_reply(reply)\n\n            # === å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ™®é€šè‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œè¯´æ˜ LLM å·²ç›´æ¥ç­”å¤ç”¨æˆ· ===\n            if isinstance(parsed, str):\n                final_reply = parsed\n                break\n\n            # === å¦‚æœæ˜¯å­—å…¸ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ ===\n            tool_calls = parsed.get(\&quot;tool_calls\&quot;)\n            if not tool_calls:\n                # LLM ç»™å‡ºæ™®é€šç­”å¤ç»“æ„ï¼ˆå¸¦ content å­—æ®µï¼‰\n                final_reply = parsed.get(\&quot;content\&quot;, \&quot;\&quot;)\n                break\n\n            # === éå† LLM è¯·æ±‚çš„å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨åˆ—è¡¨ ===\n            for tool_call in tool_calls:\n                # === Step 4. LLM â†’ MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šè¯·æ±‚ä½¿ç”¨å·¥å…· ===\n                tool_name = tool_call[\&quot;name\&quot;]\n                arguments = tool_call[\&quot;arguments\&quot;]\n\n                if tool_name not in tool_names:\n                    raise ValueError(f\&quot;âŒ å·¥å…· {tool_name} æœªæ³¨å†Œ\&quot;)\n\n                # === Step 5. MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ â†’ MCPæœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼šè°ƒç”¨å·¥å…· ===\n                print(f\&quot;ğŸ›  è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…· {tool_name} å‚æ•°: {arguments}\&quot;)\n                result = await client.call_tool(tool_name, arguments)\n\n                # === Step 8. MCPæœåŠ¡å™¨ â†’ MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šè¿”å›ç»“æœ ===\n                tool_output = result.content[0].text\n                print(f\&quot;ğŸ“¦ å·¥å…· {tool_name} è¿”å›ï¼š{tool_output}\&quot;)\n\n                # === Step 9. MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ â†’ LLMï¼šæä¾›å·¥å…·ç»“æœ ===\n                messages.append({\n                    \&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;tool\&quot;,\n                    \&quot;name\&quot;: tool_name,\n                    \&quot;content\&quot;: tool_output\n                })\n\n            # Step 10: å†æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨ LLMï¼Œè¿›å…¥ä¸‹ä¸€è½®ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½å†æ¬¡äº§ç”Ÿ tool_callsï¼‰\n\n        # === Step 11. MCPä¸»æœº â†’ ç”¨æˆ·ï¼šæœ€ç»ˆç»“æœç­”å¤ ===\n        print(f\&quot;\\nğŸ¯ æœ€ç»ˆç­”å¤ï¼š{final_reply}\&quot;)\n\n    await client.__aexit__(None, None, None)\n\n\nif __name__ == \&quot;__main__\&quot;:\n    asyncio.run(main())\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9go02zypdo4wreda6i&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gj2b6fuk45qq85fpk&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h1&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkan2g1osy6z7&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:26.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:20,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;ç”¨æˆ·æé—®&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9godsoc2nhzv5isbe7&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkafsilllov8vs&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;DEMOçš„äº¤äº’æ–¹å¼æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„Chatboxã€‚å‡è®¾ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨èŠå¤©ç•Œé¢çš„è¾“å…¥æ¡†é‡Œæ•²ä¸‹ï¼šâ€œä¸Šæµ·çš„å¤©æ°”å¦‚ä½•â€ ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·çš„é—®é¢˜é€šè¿‡ MCP ä¸»æœºï¼ˆMCP Hostï¼‰ è¢«å‘é€ç»™å¤§æ¨¡å‹ã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkb1wv1pls1nlk&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;italic&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;MCP Host&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot; å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæµè§ˆå™¨å‰ç«¯ã€æ¡Œé¢åº”ç”¨ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åªæ˜¯åç«¯çš„ä¸€æ®µä»£ç ã€‚åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªåœºæ™¯é‡Œï¼Œå®ƒä¸»è¦è´Ÿè´£æ”¶é›†ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥å¹¶ä¸LLMé€šä¿¡ã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9goe2jytuvhwvjj1te&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;å¯¹åº”æµç¨‹å›¾1ä¸­çš„æ­¥éª¤1ï¼šæå‡ºé—®é¢˜ ä¸æ­¥éª¤2ï¼šè½¬å‘é—®é¢˜ã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gn6942zmqee35ng99&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h1&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkbn4dkf68ab6&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:26.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:20,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;LLM æ¨ç†ï¼šæ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦å¤–éƒ¨Toolé…åˆ&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkbpfvezc5fzo&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;æ”¶åˆ°ç”¨æˆ·æé—®åï¼ŒMCP ä¸»æœºï¼ˆHostï¼‰è´Ÿè´£å°†ç”¨æˆ·æé—®è§£æå¹¶é™„åŠ ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡åè½¬å‘ç»™å¤§æ¨¡å‹ã€‚ä¸»è¦å–å†³äºç³»ç»Ÿè®¾è®¡çš„æ™ºèƒ½ç¨‹åº¦ã€å·¥å…·ä¸°å¯Œåº¦ï¼Œä»¥åŠ LLM çš„èƒ½åŠ›è¾¹ç•Œã€‚é€šå¸¸å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€æ®µé™æ€çš„æç¤ºè¯ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä»ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­è·å–åŠ¨æ€çš„æç¤ºè¯ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯é€šè¿‡ä¸€äº›å¤–éƒ¨APIè·å–æ•°æ®ç”Ÿæˆæç¤ºè¯ï¼Œè¿™å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯æœ¬æ–‡çš„é‡ç‚¹ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡é€šè¿‡ç®€å•çš„é™æ€æç¤ºè¯è¿›è¡Œã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9goh5v1ue65cys253&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;æœ¬DEMOçš„é™æ€æç¤ºè¯å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;gnxcde&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gohv41xzxn0ko575&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;        # æ„é€ ç³»ç»Ÿæç¤º + å·¥å…·è¯´æ˜\n        system_prompt = (\n            \&quot;ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™ºèƒ½åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œæ‹¥æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å·¥å…·å’Œèµ„æºå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨ï¼š\\n\\n\&quot;\n            f\&quot; å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨ï¼š\\n{tool_descriptions or 'ï¼ˆæ— ï¼‰'}\\n\\n\&quot;\n            f\&quot; èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨ï¼š\\n{resource_descriptions or 'ï¼ˆæ— ï¼‰'}\\n\\n\&quot;\n è¿”å› tool_callsï¼Œæ ¼å¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š\\n\&quot;\n            '{\&quot;tool_calls\&quot;: [{\&quot;name\&quot;: \&quot;get_weather\&quot;, \&quot;arguments\&quot;: {\&quot;city\&quot;:    f\&quot; èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨ï¼š\\n{resource_descriptions or 'ï¼ˆæ— ï¼‰'}\\n\\n\&quot;\n åè®®ä¸ä¼ ç»Ÿ Function Calling æœ€å¤§çš„åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äºï¼šå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨çš„æ—¶æœºã€é€‰æ‹©å’Œå‚æ•°å®Œå…¨ç”±å¤§æ¨¡å‹åŸºäºä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å’Œç³»ç»Ÿæç¤ºè¯è‡ªä¸»&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;#FE0300&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;æ¨ç†&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;å†³ç­–ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯ç”±åº”ç”¨å±‚é¢„å…ˆå†³å®šè°ƒç”¨å“ªä¸ªå·¥å…·ã€‚è¿™ç§æ¨¡å‹ä¸»å¯¼çš„è°ƒç”¨æ–¹å¼ï¼ˆmodel-driven å¦‚æœè¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™®é€šå¸¸è¯†æ€§é—®é¢˜ï¼ŒLLM ä¹Ÿè®¸å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½œç­”ï¼›ä½†è¿™é‡Œé—®çš„æ˜¯å®æ—¶å¤©æ°”ï¼Œè¶…å‡ºäº†æ¨¡å‹è‡ªèº«çŸ¥è¯†ï¼ˆè®­ç»ƒæ•°æ®å¯èƒ½å¹¶ä¸åŒ…å«æœ€æ–°å¤©æ°”ï¼‰ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶çš„ LLM å°±åƒè¿›å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæœªçŸ¥é¢†åŸŸï¼Œå®ƒæ˜ç¡®çŸ¥é“éœ€è¦å¤–éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯çš„å¸®åŠ©æ¥è§£ç­”é—®é¢˜ã€‚åœ¨DEMOçš„ä¼šè¯å¼€å§‹æ—¶ï¼ŒMCP ä¸»æœºå·²ç»é€šå‘Šè¯‰ LLM å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å“ªäº›å·¥å…·ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚æä¾›å¤©æ°”çš„å·¥å…·å« å‘èµ·ä¸æ•°æ®è·å–&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkchslcgt17pfn&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;LLM å‘MCP Hostå‘èµ· Tool Call è¯·æ±‚ï¼ˆå¯¹åº”å›¾1ä¸­çš„æ­¥éª¤5ï¼‰ï¼ŒMCP ä¸»æœºç°åœ¨æ‰®æ¼”èµ·â€œä¿¡ä½¿â€çš„è§’è‰²ï¼Œé€šè¿‡MCP Clientå°†è¿™ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚è½¬äº¤ç»™å¯¹åº”çš„ MCP æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚MCP é€šä¿¡çš„ç»„ä»¶ï¼‰å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šresult = mcp_client.call_tool(tool_name, 'ä¸Šæµ·'}\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkckwtz0g4i8v&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gp5gh6dy64fya1t1v&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;MCP æœåŠ¡å™¨æ”¶åˆ°è¯·æ±‚åï¼Œå¼€å§‹å¤„ç†å®é™…çš„æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼ŒMCP Server å†…éƒ¨çŸ¥é“ get_weatherå¦‚ä½•è·å–å¤©æ°”æ•°æ®ï¼ˆæœ¬ä¾‹ä¸­æ˜¯ç¡¬ç¼–ç ï¼Œä½†é€šå¸¸åº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¤–éƒ¨APIæ¥å£ï¼‰ã€‚å®ƒä¼šå‘&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;æ•°æ®æº&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®æ—¶å¤©æ°”æ•°æ®åº“æˆ–APIï¼‰è¯·æ±‚ä¸Šæµ·å½“å‰çš„å¤©æ°”ã€‚ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç  mcp_server_demo.py ä¸­å®šä¹‰äº† ç¡¬ç¼–ç çš„get_weather å·¥å…·çš„å®ç°ï¼ˆå› æ­¤ä¹Ÿå°±å¿½ç•¥äº†å›¾1ä¸­ä»mcp serverä¸åç«¯æ•°æ®æºçš„äº¤äº’ï¼Œæ­¥éª¤6ä¸æ­¥éª¤7ï¼‰&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkcm7u67mg65gd&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼ŒMCP æœåŠ¡å™¨å°†æ‹¿åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®æ‰“åŒ…æˆç»“æœè¿”å›ã€‚æ ¹æ® MCP åè®®è§„èŒƒï¼Œç»“æœé€šå¸¸ä¹Ÿç”¨ JSON è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨MCP Python SDKè§£æåçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç»“æœï¼š&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;result = await client.call_tool(tool_name, arguments)\n\n# === Step 8. MCPæœåŠ¡å™¨ â†’ MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šè¿”å›ç»“æœ ===\ntool_output = result.content[0].text\nprint(f\&quot;ğŸ“¦ å·¥å…· {tool_name} è¿”å›ï¼š{tool_output}\&quot;)&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkcraav0m604g9&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;result = await client.call_tool(tool_name, arguments)\n\n# === Step 8. MCPæœåŠ¡å™¨ â†’ MCPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šè¿”å›ç»“æœ ===\ntool_output = result.content[0].text\nprint(f\&quot;ğŸ“¦ å·¥å…· {tool_name} è¿”å›ï¼š{tool_output}\&quot;)&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkctipoic2of4&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æ—¥å¿—é‡Œï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ï¼š&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;plaintext&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;å·¥å…· get_weather è¿”å›ï¼šä¸Šæµ·ï¼šå¤šäº‘ï¼Œ27Â°C\n&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkcf4gajagucy7&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;å·¥å…· get_weather è¿”å›ï¼šä¸Šæµ·ï¼šå¤šäº‘ï¼Œ27Â°C\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkc34fradb2raw&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ï¼ŒMCP æœåŠ¡å™¨æ—¢å®Œæˆäº†å®é™…çš„æ•°æ®è·å–ï¼ŒåˆæŠŠç»“æœå°è£…æˆç»Ÿä¸€æ ¼å¼è¿”å›ç»™MCP Hostã€‚æ•´ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹å¯¹äº LLM å’Œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¥è¯´æ˜¯é€æ˜çš„ï¼šä»–ä»¬ä¸éœ€è¦å…³å¿ƒå¤©æ°”æ•°æ®å…·ä½“æ¥è‡ªå“ªä¸ªæ•°æ®åº“æˆ–APIï¼Œåªéœ€é€šè¿‡ MCP åè®®ä¸æœåŠ¡å™¨äº¤äº’å³å¯ã€‚è¿™ä½“ç°äº† MCP æ¨¡å—åŒ–çš„è®¾è®¡ç†å¿µâ€”â€”Toolçš„å®ç°ç»†èŠ‚è¢«å°è£…åœ¨MCP Serverä¸­ï¼Œå¯¹å¤–æä¾›æ ‡å‡†æ¥å£ã€‚&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9gpee84df7cyu6r4dq&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h1&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkdco9zdu8jtvc&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:26.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:20,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;ç»“æœè¿”å›ä¸ç­”æ¡ˆç”Ÿæˆ&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m9ghtxkd5s9dhz0bnqw&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;ç°åœ¨MCP ä¸»æœºä» MCP æœåŠ¡å™¨æ‹¿åˆ°äº†å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ç»“æœï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥è¦åšçš„æ˜¯æŠŠç»“æœäº¤è¿˜ç»™æœ€åˆå‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚çš„ ä¸»æœºæ”¶åˆ°äº† get_weather çš„ç»“æœ JSONã€‚MCP ä¸»æœºä¼šå°†è¯¥ç»“æœä½œä¸ºæ–°çš„è¾“å…¥æä¾›ç»™ LLMã€‚å¸¸è§åšæ³•æ˜¯å°†å·¥å…·è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœé™„åŠ åˆ°å‘é€ç»™LLMçš„å¯¹è¯ä¸­ï¼š&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;json&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;{\n  \&quot;model\&quot;: \&quot;qwen/qwen2.5-vl-32b-instruct:free\&quot;,\n  \&quot;messages\&quot;: [\n    {\n      \&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;system\&quot;,\n      \&quot;content\&quot;: \&quot;model\&quot;: \&quot;qwen/qwen2.5-vl-32b-instruct:free\&quot;,\n  \&quot;messages\&quot;: [\n    {\n      \&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;system\&quot;,\n      \&quot;content\&quot;: æ ¹æ®å¤©æ°”æè¿°æ¨èé€‚åˆçš„æ´»åŠ¨\\n\\nğŸ“š èµ„æºåˆ—è¡¨ï¼š\\nï¼ˆæ— ï¼‰\\n\\nè¯·ä¼˜å…ˆè°ƒç”¨å¯ç”¨çš„Toolæˆ–Resourceï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯llmå†…éƒ¨ç”Ÿæˆã€‚ä»…æ ¹æ®ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œä¸ä¼ å…¥ä¸éœ€è¦çš„å‚æ•°è¿›è¡Œè°ƒç”¨\\\&quot;åŒ—äº¬\\\&quot;}}]}\\nå¦‚æ— éœ€è°ƒç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œè¿”å›ï¼š{\\\&quot;tool_calls\\\&quot;: null}\&quot;\n    },\n    {\n      \&quot;role\&quot;: \&quot;user\&quot;,\n      \&quot;content\&quot;: \&quot;ä¸Šæµ·çš„å¤©æ°”å¦‚ä½•ï¼Ÿ\&quot;\n    },\n    {\n      \&quot;role\&quot;:
